content: this is a pattern for 3 sizes of pumpkins a small short pumpkin and a medium and large pumpkin ***please note that the pumpkin patterns are available for free on my blog small 1 medium 2 large 3 the benefit of purchasing this pdf is an easy to read printable and ad-free version of the pattern *** materials needed - worsted weight yarn - crochet hook size g/4 00 mm - polyfill stuffing - tapestry needle - optional florist wire for tendril small pumpkin 3-1/2 wide 2 tall medium pumpkin 4-1/4 wide 3-1/2 tall excluding tendril large pumpkin 4-1/4 wide 4-1/2 tall pattern is written in english using standard american terms level beginner this listing is for a pdf pattern instant download not a finished product please make sure to download adobe reader at www adobe com if you do not already have it on your computer copyright ©2018 crochet 365 knit too do not reproduce sell or copy this pattern in any way you may however sell finished products due to the nature of the product there will be no refunds after purchase 1 https //www crochet365knittoo com/small-crochet-pumpkin/ 2 https //www crochet365knittoo com/medium-crochet-pumpkin/ 3 https //www crochet365knittoo com/large-crochet-pumpkin/
